title: Investigate Missing Values
description: First things first: I have some data analysis background from my research career in particle physics, but I am far from being an machine learning expert. So please bear with me and I am happy to receive any kind of feedback. Since the training data set (and possibly the test data as well) contain missing data, I wanted to have a closer look at this issue. I have seen that other participants propose to fill those NaNs with the mean or median for the respective column. Here I am not (yet) that much interested in filling the blanks but I rather want to know whether we can learn something more about the data when looking missing values.
